lyrics:
6 contributorspage avenue lyricsi still recall every summer night
like it was yesterday
the time would never end
and my friends were family
nothing mattered more
than the loyalty we had
now im a world away from everything we shared

i had something better
waiting ahead
i try to take control of my heart
i had something better
but ill tear it down and ill tape it up
by my own design i fall

bring back the days
three story parking lot
the air is never dry
as the city falls asleep days bleed into the night
the tables set the stage
for a life of memories
but im a world away from everything

i had something better
waiting ahead
i try to take control of my heart
i had something better
but ill tear it down and ill tape it up
by my own design i fall
you might also likeapart as time passes by
i fall apart but the memories never die
and i still recall every summer night
it seems like yesterday but im still a world away

i had something better
waiting ahead
i try to take control of my heart
i had something better
but ill tear it down and ill tape it up
by my own design i fallembed
